content:
Enable users to enter a line of text by adding the Text element to your OmniScript. Limit the length of the text using minimum and maximum values and set allowable information using the mask property.

Drag a Text element from the Build panel onto the canvas.
In the Properties panel, give the element a name in the Name field.
In Field Label, enter a label visible to the user.
(Optional) To set the type of information and its format, enter a Mask such as (999) 999-9999[x9999], which accepts a North American phone number with an optional extension. When you set the Mask property on text fields, Salesforce shows the default error message instead of custom error messages for those fields.

(Optional) In Minimum Length, set the minimum length of the text allowed, such as 1.
(Optional) In Maximum Length, set the maximum length of text allowed, such as 300.
(Optional) For Validation Options and other additional properties, see Common OmniScript Element Properties Definitions.
title: Configuring Text Elements in OmniStudio
